channel.title: Killed myself as a knight
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was a knight, died protecting the king AND was possessed and killed by a knight protecting the king: https://imgur.com/a/Lv0nG There was only 1 knight that game (me), so that means i killed myself, which is not right.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was possessed, so I should've just killed the king and stayed alive
#### Steps to reproduce: Have a knight protecting the king and a possessor possessing that knight and forcing him to kill the king
#### Comments: full chat log recorded in a video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ss36QWzr3J4
Also there's something up with the king (1) and possessor (12) classes. 1 was the king the whole game, but his start and final classes are "possessor". 12 was never king but his start and final classes are "king". It seems like 12 took over the king's body, so the start classes for them should probably be reversed: 12 should be possessor and 1 should be king. Or maybe i'm missing something here.

Being possessed does not Occupy you. If an observer visited the king they would see you visiting him twice. What happened is your guard went through as well as the possession attack. The knights guard ability kills the attacker. This means that the Possessor - Knight interaction is completely intended.
